CustomField.description: Set the log level for which messages are stored in the log stack for a transaction. Whenever a statement is logged and the statements level is encompassed by the currently set General Log Level, the message will be added to the Log Stack and be included in any reports.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which messages are stored in the log stack for a transaction. Valid values are NONE, TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, and FATAL. Any statements with a level equal or higher to the one configured here will be logged.
CustomField.label: General Log Level
